nodes.text: Samara Organa was a female Human member of House Organa and ambassador to House Panteer during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

During the Alderaan Civil War, Samara was determined to discern the truth about the assassination of Senator Gaul Panteer and uncover his murderer after the end of the Great Galactic War. In 3643 BBY, she was allied with Captain Orrick Gwyndon of the Panteer Queensguard where they tasked a Republic ally to recover the assassination holorecording from the library in the Holo Archives of Castle Panteer.

Samara appears in the mission "Red Handed" for Republic allied players in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as the mission starting point and endpoint. She is also a flirting option for male players of Republic classes.
